summary: Predict class probabilities using a ML model
description: Applies a machine learning model to an array and predicts (class) probabilities for them.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: A ML model that can be trained with one of the ML processes such as ``fit_regr_random_forest()``.

returns.description: The predicted (class) probabilities. Returns `null` if any of the given values in the array is a no-data value.
